So I ve seen a few people commenting that the lyric are cringy and weak I mean everyone is entitled to their opinion so I ll say that for me the lyric were beyond satisfactory I m saying this because they matched the feeling I got from the overall ensemble the feel good about yourself vibe and don t let the world hinder you from achieving your dream message Maybe it is overrated for some people but you got ta admit that it s different from the other genre we got this year at least from my playlist Not too confident or arrogant just self acceptance and enough optimism to overcome struggle and prejudice And I actually needed that mindset today when the stress for assessment wa wrecking my nerve and my professor wa acting like a jerk So I just wish Lay s hard work would not be swept under the rug just because of that The song is fun and it make people happy I think that s what count the most It may not meet everyone s expectation but judging by the like it kind of doe for most anyway With that said every other song on the album deserves a much attention and appreciation Lay really did not disappoint me with this comeback
